attributes.action: Stop means testing savings when pensioners apply for state benefits or care.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government should encourage saving by workers and pensioners by means- testing actual income only and they should treat everyone fairly by not penalising them for scraping and saving and working hard before and after their retirement and they should only tax their income if it is above the tax threshold and savings should not be taken into account for any state benefits.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
